mapper.select: SELECT family_room.id, family_room.`name`, family_room.floor_id, family_room.create_time, family_room.update_time, family_room.beacon_uuid FROM device_user_favorite INNER JOIN device_device ON device_user_favorite.device_id = device_device.id INNER JOIN family_room ON device_device.room_id = family_room.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY device_device.room_id
